alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 8:24PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Latimer and central Pittsburg Counties through 800 PM CST... At 724 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Savanna, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Hartshorne... Krebs... Savanna... Alderson... Higgins... Haywood... Mcalester Regional Airport... Haileyville... Arpelar... Gowen... Dow... Bache... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
